main event: A group of lights fused together was observed in the sky over Hollister, California on May 13, 1955.
interesting points: The lights appeared to fly at speeds of over 200 MPH,The observer was a civilian airline pilot who reported the sighting,The sighting lasted for approximately one hour, Initial investigation suggested the sighting was caused by an RC-121 aircraft, The lights changed in intensity rapidly during the observation.
sighted object: group of lights in the sky
